alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Delaware County through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andes, or 9 miles southeast of Delhi, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roxbury, Andes, Margaretville, Hobart, Fleischmanns, Arkville, Bovina Center, Dunraven, Halcottsville and New Kingston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
